text:
Conversify (http://www.conversify.com)

Where: Groningen (NL) or REMOTE

Looking for a fulltime Chief Intelligence Officer / Data-scientist.

Conversify is helping e-commerce sites with optimizing their conversions by using persuasion. We have tons of data, big customers and a stack consisting of: MongoDB, Python, Django, JavaScript, Postgres and much more ;-).

You: Fluency in Python (numpy/scipy), MongoDB, R or Matlab and Django.

More info?

E: bart[at]conversify.com

Skype: bkappenburg
